com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.sessions.impl

Interface Markings

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OffsetMarkingsImpl

    public interface Markings
    The interface Markings is used to handle markings of a document. It is required by DocumentSession which could be instantiated via GuiFactory.documentSessions()

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Markings NULL
      The NULL Markings could be used if the integration should support checking and displaying the report only.

    • Method Summary

      Methods
